generated_body: The article is likely to provide an overview of Lexus's entry into the luxury yacht market, detailing the features and specifications of the LY 650 model. It may discuss the design elements, technology integrations, and the luxury amenities offered in this high-end yacht. The pricing information, particularly the cost of a fully-loaded model at $4.85 million, will likely be highlighted to convey the exclusivity of the offering. Additionally, the article could explore the implications of Lexus venturing into this new market segment and what this means for luxury consumers.
